name: Gaoping Qiyi Coal Mine
company_mentions: Shanxi Coal Transportation and Marketing Group Qiyi Coal Industry Company

The Gaoping Qiyi Coal Mine is an underground coal mine located in Xilimeng Village, Hexi Town, Gaoping City, Jinzhong City, Shanxi Province

operators: Shanxi Coal Transportation and Marketing Group Qiyi Coal Industry Company
web_search_companies.notes: The mine is operated by Shanxi Coal Transportation and Marketing Group Qiyi Coal Industry Company, which is fully owned by Jinneng Group.
